sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the in vitro antitumor action of the different extracts of different solvents from Ganoderma lipsiense.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨树舌灵芝各溶剂提取物的抗癌作用。

sentences.english: The biology activity and separation of peptides in fermentive ganoderma lucidum were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了发酵灵芝粉中肽类化合物的分离及其生物活性。

sentences.english: Triterpenoids are the main efficacious ingredients in ganoderma spore lipids.
sentences.chinese: 灵芝三萜类化合物是灵芝孢子油中的主要功效成分。

sentences.english: Triterpenoids are the main efficacious ingredients in ganoderma spore lipids.
sentences.chinese: 灵芝三萜类化合物是灵芝孢子油中的主要功效成分。

sentences.english: The hypha achieves the request as the mother culture by observation.
sentences.chinese: 试验观察灵芝菌种达到作为母种使用的要求。

sentences.english: This article mainly discussed the mechanism of micro-milling and extraction of ganoderma lucidum polysaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了微粉提取灵芝多聚糖的作用机理。

sentences.english: Lingzhi Detox Tea slimming effect with the double.
sentences.chinese: 配合灵芝排毒茶瘦身功效加倍。

sentences.english: Bai Suzhen laughs in the face of death, selects the ganoderma lucidum immortal grass finally, excited goes.
sentences.chinese: 白素珍舍生忘死，终于摘取灵芝仙草，兴奋而去。

sentences.english: With the core of glossy ganoderma culture, Alphay concentrates its efforts on creating enterprise culture.
sentences.chinese: 公司以灵芝文化为核心，着力打造企业文化。

sentences.english: Ganoderma lucidum is one of most frequently used fungi in Chinese medicine and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 灵芝是我国医药学宝库中的一种珍贵的药食两用菌。

sentences.english: Respective additions of selenium and cerium resulted in an obvious increase of polysaccharide content in the supernatant.
sentences.chinese: 两种元素还可明显提高菌液中灵芝多糖的含量。

sentences.english: Some original work on genetic engineering of Ganoderma lucidum have been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 论文在灵芝基因工程方面做了一些开创性的研究。

sentences.english: The Lycium barbarum polysaccharides and the Ganoderma lucidum polysaccharides have different bio- active functions.
sentences.chinese: 灵芝多糖和枸杞多糖均具有良好的生理活性功能。

sentences.english: XiaoFei deliberately put the emperor to a huge ganoderma lucidum side.
sentences.chinese: 萧妃故意把皇上带到一颗巨大的灵芝身边。

sentences.english: Ganoderma Lucidum is called as Mesona chinensis, has no toxic side effects on human body.
sentences.chinese: 灵芝自古以来被称为“仙草”，对人体无毒无副作用。

sentences.english: Liquid Ganoderma spore oil capsule and preparation method relates to a Chinese medicinal preparation.
sentences.chinese: 灵芝孢子油液体胶囊及制备方法，涉及一种中药制剂。

definition: King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
